TopicTitle: Hey. I'm not new here, but I have a new username.

Articles.Content:
I used to be VincentMcConnell on these forums but I just decided to go ahead and register a new name.

I got sick of the old one. So hi everyone, from my new, bottle rocketeer account. lol.
Hold up, is it not possible to request a name change? Im not sure what the rules are on that though....
I don't know. I felt like I wanted to start fresh with a new profile anyway. I've done it on youtube before. Sometimes I just get tired of the same profile.

I don't know. I felt like I wanted to start fresh with a new profile anyway. I've done it on youtube before. Sometimes I just get tired of the same profile.

Allright, cool stuff. Enjoy the new forum format lol.

It's really confusing... I'm trying to find the "unread topics" thing that allows me to see if anyone has replied to threads on which I commented. For senior members, does the forum have the new layout?

It's really confusing... I'm trying to find the "unread topics" thing that allows me to see if anyone has replied to threads on which I commented. For senior members, does the forum have the new layout?

Yeah, theres literally no difrence bettween a senior member and a junior, other than post count. Im just as lost. (thats why I made a fail group )

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Yada, yada...

Arrr!

Capt'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
Hm, the forum is confusing at first then I realized it's pretty much the same way Facepunch is so, I got used to it pretty quickly.
Happy Program Regeneration, Vincent! Guess the Kerbal government thought that you were competent of mass-Kerbicide.
